mapper.insert:
select trade_comment_seq.nextval from dual
insert into trade_comment(trade_comment_no, trade_no, trade_comment_member_id, trade_comment_content, trade_comment_time_posted) values(#{tradeCommentNo}, #{tradeNo}, #{tradeCommentMemberId}, #{tradeCommentContent}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select trade_comment_no, trade_no, trade_comment_member_id, trade_comment_content, to_char(trade_comment_time_posted, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as trade_comment_time_posted from trade_comment where trade_no=#{value} order by trade_comment_no
